svconnect

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • svconnect.Device
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RoboRioBoard, SimplifiedRoboRio

    public class Device
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of an arbitrary system on a schematic. All pins are instantiated only once.
    Author:
    tthompso

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ccre.channel.BooleanInput booleanInputPin(java.lang.String pinName)
      Connect to a pin that will notify outputs when it has gotten new data.
      static ccre.channel.BooleanOutput booleanOutputPin(java.lang.String pinName)
      Connect to a pin that will output a value at the latest opprotunity.
      static ccre.channel.BooleanInput ended()
      An input that will turn true once the simulation has ended and will remain true after that.
      static ccre.channel.FloatInput floatInputPin(java.lang.String pinName)
      Connect to a pin that will notify outputs when it has gotten new data.
      static ccre.channel.FloatOutput floatOutputPin(java.lang.String pinName)
      Connect to a pin that will output a value at the latest opportunity.
      static ccre.channel.EventInput running()
      An event that will fire every time time updates, or more precisely, every time all of the float input pins have finished being notified.
      static ccre.channel.BooleanInput started()
      An input that will turn true once the simulation has started, and then will remain true after that.

    • Method Detail

      • floatOutputPin

        public static ccre.channel.FloatOutput floatOutputPin(java.lang.String pinName)
        Connect to a pin that will output a value at the latest opportunity. NOTE: SVX requires that a value is sent to it every tick of simulation time. This means that even if a value being sent to it hasn't changed, it will be sent anyway.
        Parameters:
        pinName - The name of the pin to connect to.
        Returns:
        An output representing an input to the schematic.

      • floatInputPin

        public static ccre.channel.FloatInput floatInputPin(java.lang.String pinName)
        Connect to a pin that will notify outputs when it has gotten new data. NOTE: Time will not advance untill all pins have been notified of new data and sent data to all its outputs.
        Parameters:
        pinName - The name of the pin to connect to.
        Returns:
        An input representing an output from the schematic.

      • booleanOutputPin

        public static ccre.channel.BooleanOutput booleanOutputPin(java.lang.String pinName)
        Connect to a pin that will output a value at the latest opprotunity. NOTE: SVX requires that a value is sent to it every tick of simulation time. This means that even if a value being sent to it hasn't changed, something will be sent anyway.
        Parameters:
        pinName - The name of the pin to connect to.
        Returns:
        An output representing an input to the schematic.

      • booleanInputPin

        public static ccre.channel.BooleanInput booleanInputPin(java.lang.String pinName)
        Connect to a pin that will notify outputs when it has gotten new data. NOTE: Time will not advance untill all pins have been notified of new data and sent data to all its outputs.
        Parameters:
        pinName - The name of the pin to connect to.
        Returns:
        An input representing an output from the schematic.

      • running

        public static ccre.channel.EventInput running()
        An event that will fire every time time updates, or more precisely, every time all of the float input pins have finished being notified.
        Returns:

      • started

        public static ccre.channel.BooleanInput started()
        An input that will turn true once the simulation has started, and then will remain true after that.
        Returns:

        public static ccre.channel.BooleanInput ended()
        An input that will turn true once the simulation has ended and will remain true after that.
